statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({7.01}+{8.63}\right)}={31.28}\approx{31.28}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.63}\cdot{6.07}={52.3841}\approx{52.4}.
